perturbation.original_text:
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the
Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this
Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on some of the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the
Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period at the company's discretion. All amendments to this Agreement do not require any signatures.
perturbation.explanation: By stating that the NFL logo is used on 'some' products and 'at the company's discretion' creates ambiguity, and no signatures are required contradicts the original agreement which clearly defines that ALL licensed products will use the NFL logo, and require all signatures for amendment. The agreement becomes unenforceable due to a lack of clarity on which products are endorsed and which are not.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Clear and Definite Terms

perturbation.original_text:

beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this

perturbation.changed_text:
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter if the company decides to provide the donation. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and will be based on the company's discretion and decision when they want to start the donation, and for how long. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.explanation: By adding 'if the company decides' introduces a condition that contradicts the original intent of a mandatory donation per unit sold. Adding 'will be based on the company's discretion and decision when they want to start the donation, and for how long' makes the payment entirely discretionary, undermining the financial commitment outlined in the original agreement. This creates uncertainty about whether the NFLA-NC will receive any donations, contradicting the contract's remuneration terms.

perturbation.original_text:
The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s
Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC only if they desire, to provide upon request, to see if the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s Licensed Products should be released.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'The company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request' to 'The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC only if they desire, to provide upon request, to see if the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s Licensed Products should be released' undermines transparency and accountability. By making the report's release contingent on the Company's desire, the NFLA-NC loses the ability to independently verify sales figures and ensure accurate donation payments. This directly contradicts the intended transparency of the contract.
